means: （圣经）申命记（旧约中的一卷），预言

sentence.Network_en: I found myself clutching for a verse from Deuteronomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知不觉中我发现自己琢磨起了《圣经》中的句于.

sentence.Network_en: Deuteronomy 28:64,65 tells us about the people of Israel.
sentence.Network_cn: 申命记28:64,65给我们讲述了以色列民.

sentence.Network_en: Deuteronomy 6:16 Ye shall not tempt the LORD your God, as ye tempted him in Massah.
sentence.Network_cn: 申命记6章16节你们不可试探耶和华你们的神, 像你们在玛撒那样试探他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: we have to find old deuteronomy ., 我们必须找到老戒律伯.
deuteronomic 申命记的, deuteronomy 《申命记》, deuteronomic 预言性的
and be careful of old deuteronomy ., 小心老申命者.

list.abs: i believe it is old deuteronomy ., 我相信他是老申命者.
we have to find old deuteronomy ., 我们必须找到老戒律伯.
